text:

My colleagues and I are demanding @TheJusticeDept #ReleaseTheFullMuellerReport with all underlying evidence to Congress no later than April 2.pic.twitter.com/qrGyJsW5Ir

html: The disappearance of the Washington Post journalist Jamal Kashoggi in Istanbul this week should be of great concern to everyone who believes in the freedom of the press and the First Amendment. Silencing and demonizing reporters is contrary to our fundamental values as Americans.

html: John McCain was a patriot who served our country with honor and distinction. I believe we should follow tradition and have the American flag flown at Half Mast until he is laid to rest at the United States Naval Academy in Annapolis on Sunday.
text: John McCain was a patriot who served our country with honor and distinction. I believe we should follow tradition and have the American flag flown at Half Mast until he is laid to rest at the United States Naval Academy in Annapolis on Sunday.

html: Our country has lost a brave and courageous American with the passing of John McCain tonight. He lived a remarkable life that was dedicated to public service. A grateful nation will miss his charismatic leadership.
text: Our country has lost a brave and courageous American with the passing of John McCain tonight. He lived a remarkable life that was dedicated to public service. A grateful nation will miss his charismatic leadership.

html: John McCain is a patriot who has served our nation throughout his life with honor and distinction. The American people have admired his straight talk and bipartisan leadership for decades. During this difficult time, I will keep him in my thoughts and prayers.
text: John McCain is a patriot who has served our nation throughout his life with honor and distinction. The American people have admired his straight talk and bipartisan leadership for decades. During this difficult time, I will keep him in my thoughts and prayers.
